Title: The Real World
Notes: openly gay, infected by one of his partners, famous AIDS educator

Title: General Hospital
Notes: white female teenager, infected by her boyfriend Stone Cates.

Title: Murder One
Notes: Cross is an unscrupulous businessman whose imminent death from AIDS leads to an ethical awakening.

Title: Oz
Character name: Various including Antonio Nappa, James Robson, Nat Ginzburg and Clarence Seroy
Notes: Men, infected while in prison, HIV positive inmates are isolated in Unit E, a cell block exclusively for HIV positive inmates not allowed to be amongst general inmate population.

Title: ER
Notes: African-American female adult, infected by husband.

Title: Queer as Folk
Notes: Vic was Michael Novotney's uncle. Ben was Michael's boyfriend and a college professor. Hunter was a former hustler who became Ben and Michael's foster son.

Title: Takalani Sesame
Notes: Five-year-old female puppet. Contracted HIV via tainted blood transfusion. World's first HIV-positive Sesame Street Muppet.

Title: Nip/Tuck
Notes: Sex addict. Had a child before she knew she was infected with the virus but the baby did not contract it. Re-appeared briefly to work as a receptionist at McNamara/Troy but died soon after when she fell off a building.

Title: Home and Away
Notes: Cassie contracted HIV after sleeping with her older boyfriend Henk, who had contracted the disease from a drug addicted former girlfriend.

Title: The Best Years
Notes: Bisexual Lee owns local hot spot nightclub Colony.

Title: Hollyoaks
Notes: Heterosexual male; contracted the disease and kept it a secret from girlfriend Mercedes. He told his brother Kris as he may have contracted it from a one night stand with Merdedes Mercedes & Malachy were to marry but ended their relationship, a row in the pub had Mercedes revealing his disease to his friends & Mum, They couple later married, Mercedes is awiting her results.

Title: South Park
Notes: In the episode 'Tonsil Trouble' Cartman is infected with HIV during a tonsillectomy When Broflovski mocks him, Cartman secretly injects him with infected blood to pass on the virus. Both are subsequently cured through injections of money into the bloodstream.
